Queries.EmailExists: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE email = @email;
Queries.RegisterUser: INSERT INTO user (email, passwordHash, userName, roleID) VALUES (@email, @passwordHash, @userName, 1);
Queries.AuthenticateUser: SELECT userID, passwordHash, userName, roleID from user WHERE email = @email;
Queries.UserNameExists: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM user WHERE userName = @userName;
